campaigns.title: Meet - AI Virtual Background 4K Webcam
campaigns.short_desc:
The first-ever 4K webcam that embeded AI technology to
protect your background during video calls.
campaigns.content:
Capture everything in 4k, with extended battery life and pro-g inspired features. Choose from three 4k recording modes: UHD, HD and cinematic 24p. Use the Wi-Fi feature to connect and stream

your footage wirelessly directly to your iOS and Android smartphones

or tablets for instant sharing. The monitor has a 3.5" touch screen

for easy navigation and built-in wifi that automatically connects

to the last used smartphone or tablet once paired.
